description: This PHP source file generates a web interface page for configuring and viewing Ethernet port information on a network device. It includes server-side logic for fetching port status and settings, and client-side JavaScript for user interactions and AJAX updates.

methods.name: getPort4XHSEnabled
methods.description: Function to determine if port 4 is enabled for XHS (Port4XHSEnabled) based on device parameters.

methods.name: NameMap
methods.description: Function to map Ethernet port statuses to human-readable labels, considering WAN operational modes.
